pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Analysis Tools over Space of Phylogenetic Trees Using Tropical Geometry // Process phylogenetic trees with tropical support vector machine and principal component analysis defined with tropical geometry. Details about tropical support vector machine are available in : Tang, X., Wang, H. Yoshida, R. (2020) arXiv:2003.00677. Details about tropical principle component analysis are available in : Page, R., Yoshida, R. Zhang L. (2020) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btaa564 and Yoshida, R., Zhang, L. Zhang, X. (2019) doi:10.1007/s11538-018-0493-4.
